name: Extraordinary Mission
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

"Police office Lin Kai is assigned to go undercover to infiltrate a drug cartel named “Twin Eagles”. In order to gain the trust of Eagle the leader of the cartel that he is trying to locate and shut down, Lin Kai slowly unwillingly becomes a drug addict himself. Things get even more complicated when Lin Kai realizes that Eagle has been plotting a violent revenge against his supervisor Li Jian Guo for over a decade. Lin Kai begins to lose control of himself as the addiction grows by the day. The cast includes Huang Xuan, Duan Yihong, Lang Yueting, Zu Feng, Xing Jia-Dong, and David Wang."
about_the_game:
"Police office Lin Kai is assigned to go undercover to infiltrate a drug cartel named “Twin Eagles”. In order to gain the trust of Eagle the leader of the cartel that he is trying to locate and shut down, Lin Kai slowly unwillingly becomes a drug addict himself. Things get even more complicated when Lin Kai realizes that Eagle has been plotting a violent revenge against his supervisor Li Jian Guo for over a decade. Lin Kai begins to lose control of himself as the addiction grows by the day.



The cast includes Huang Xuan, Duan Yihong, Lang Yueting, Zu Feng, Xing Jia-Dong, and David Wang."
short_description: Extraordinary Mission is an action thriller directed by Alan Mak (Infernal Affairs) and Anthony Pun. The film revolves an undercover police officer who attempts to take down a drug trafficking syndicate from the inside.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
